::Zardus::

Zardus exits the bridge of the Alliance base, heading for the conference room 
as he recieves Nemesis' transmission.

"Ah, yes," Zardus replies, "Please meet me in the conference room. We have a 
visitor, named Soundwave."

With that, he reaches the conference room, entering and walking to a seat.

"Welcome to my base, Soundwave," he says as he sits down, assuming a 
diplomatic voice, "The battle was a bit distracting as you first said your 
goals for coming here. I remembered you saying something about peace?"
